data.eml:eml: A taxonomic revision of the catshark genus Haploblepharus Garman 1913 (Chondrichthyes: Carcharhiniformes: Scyliorhinidae).

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brett A. Human (2007): A taxonomic revision of the catshark genus Haploblepharus Garman 1913 (Chondrichthyes: Carcharhiniformes: Scyliorhinidae). Zootaxa 1451: 1-40, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:1FEC783D-01D3-4458-9EE6-B499AF81A83F
